sources.title: The Driver | Full Movie | Action Crime | Michael Lazar
sources.description:
The Driver - A criminal getaway driver plays by his code and set of rules for years. When he is forced to break his rules, it starts a domino effect of chaos in an already dangerous world of treacherous players.
2021.  Stars: Michael Lazar, Noha Amer, Rich Hevner

metadata.Plot: "The Driver" is a specialist in a rare business: he drives getaway cars in robberies. His exceptional talent prevented him from being caught yet. After another successful flight from the police, a self-assured detective makes it his primary goal to catch the Driver. He promises remission of punishment to a gang if they help to convict him in a set-up robbery. The Driver seeks help from "The Player" (Isabelle) to mislead the detective.
metadata.Actors: Ryan O'Neal, Bruce Dern, Isabelle Adjani
